languages.text: "Боюсь, что нет, Лорд-капитан. Все, что я могу предложить вам — досужие сплетни от экипажа: о проклятых кораблях-серпах, которые можно встретить вдали от изученных маршрутов, и их чудовищных экипажах..."
"I am afraid so, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle tales — talk of cursed sickle ships one may run into when straying far from known routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, что нет, Лорд-капитан. Все, что я могу предложить вам — досужие сплетни от экипажа: о проклятых кораблях-серпах, которые можно встретить вдали от изученных маршрутов, и их чудовищных экипажах..."

traits.locale_text: "I'm afraid not, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle gossip: talk of cursed crescent ships you may run into away from charted routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."
"I'm afraid not, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle gossip: talk of cursed crescent ships you may run into away from charted routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."
"I'm afraid not, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle gossip — talk of cursed sickle ships you may run into on uncharted routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."
"I'm afraid not, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle gossip — talk of cursed sickle ships you may run into on uncharted routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."
"I am afraid so, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle tales — talk of cursed sickle ships one may run into when straying far from known routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."

languages.text: “恐怕我们确实一无所知，舰长大人。我能告诉您的，恐怕只有船员们的闲言碎语。大家都在谈论那些在未知航线上游荡的镰刀型飞船，还有那些飞船上可怕的船员……”
languages.original_text: "I am afraid so, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle tales — talk of cursed sickle ships one may run into when straying far from known routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我们确实一无所知，舰长大人。我能告诉您的，恐怕只有船员们的闲言碎语。大家都在谈论那些在未知航线上游荡的镰刀型飞船，还有那些飞船上可怕的船员……”

languages.text: « J'en ai bien peur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne peux que vous relayer les ragots qui circulent parmi l'équipage : des histoires de vaisseaux maudits en forme de faucille que l'on rencontre en territoire inconnu et de leurs monstrueux équipages... »
languages.original_text: "I am afraid so, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle tales — talk of cursed sickle ships one may run into when straying far from known routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai bien peur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne peux que vous relayer les ragots qui circulent parmi l'équipage : des histoires de vaisseaux maudits en forme de faucille que l'on rencontre en territoire inconnu et de leurs monstrueux équipages... »

languages.text: "Ich fürchte ja, Lord Captain. Ich kann Euch nur mit Gerüchten der Crew dienen – Gerede über verfluchte Sichelschiffe, denen man begegnen kann, wenn man von den bekannten Routen abweicht, und über die monströsen Crews dieser Schiffe ..."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid so, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle tales — talk of cursed sickle ships one may run into when straying far from known routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte ja, Lord Captain. Ich kann Euch nur mit Gerüchten der Crew dienen – Gerede über verfluchte Sichelschiffe, denen man begegnen kann, wenn man von den bekannten Routen abweicht, und über die monströsen Crews dieser Schiffe ..."

"Ich fürchte nein, Lord Captain. Ich kann Euch nur mit unnützen Gerüchten der Crew dienen – Gerede über verfluchte Sichelschiffe, denen man auf nicht erkundeten Routen begegnen kann, und über die monströsen Crews dieser Schiffe ..."

languages.text: «Eso me temo, Lord Capitán. Solo puedo ofrecerle las habladurías de la tripulación. Historias de naves malditas con forma de hoz y tripuladas por monstruos, al acecho lejos de las rutas conocidas...».
languages.original_text: "I am afraid so, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle tales — talk of cursed sickle ships one may run into when straying far from known routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."

traits.locale_text: «Eso me temo, Lord Capitán. Solo puedo ofrecerle las habladurías de la tripulación. Historias de naves malditas con forma de hoz y tripuladas por monstruos, al acecho lejos de las rutas conocidas...».

languages.text: 「残念ですがそうです、ロード・キャプテン。私がお伝えできるのは乗組員のたわいもない噂話だけです。既知の航路を外れた先で出くわすかもしれない呪われた鎌の船や、その船に乗る怪物のような乗組員たちの話など…」
languages.original_text: "I am afraid so, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle tales — talk of cursed sickle ships one may run into when straying far from known routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ですがそうです、ロード・キャプテン。私がお伝えできるのは乗組員のたわいもない噂話だけです。既知の航路を外れた先で出くわすかもしれない呪われた鎌の船や、その船に乗る怪物のような乗組員たちの話など…」

languages.text: "Korkarım öyle Lord Kaptan. Tayfanın kendi arasında anlattığı boş hikâyelerden başka bir şey yok elimde. Bilindik yollardan uzaklaşanların rastladığı meşum orak gemiler, bu gemilerin ucube tayfaları..."
languages.original_text: "I am afraid so, Lord Captain. All I can offer you is the crew's idle tales — talk of cursed sickle ships one may run into when straying far from known routes, and of those ships' monstrous crews..."
